Tag.description: A key-value pair to associate with a resource.

properties.name: Key
properties.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The key name of the tag. You can specify a value that is 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

type.description: The value for the tag. You can specify a value that is 0 to 256 Unicode characters in length and cannot be prefixed with aws:. You can use any of the following characters: the set of Unicode letters, digits, whitespace, _, ., /, =, +, and -.

properties.name: ActiveDate
properties.description: Specifies the active date for the certificate.

type.description: Specifies the active date for the certificate.

properties.name: Certificate
properties.description: Specifies the certificate body to be imported.

type.description: Specifies the certificate body to be imported.

properties.name: CertificateChain
properties.description: Specifies the certificate chain to be imported.

type.description: Specifies the certificate chain to be imported.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: A textual description for the certificate.

type.description: A textual description for the certificate.

properties.name: InactiveDate
properties.description: Specifies the inactive date for the certificate.

type.description: Specifies the inactive date for the certificate.

properties.name: PrivateKey
properties.description: Specifies the private key for the certificate.

type.description: Specifies the private key for the certificate.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for certificates. Tags are metadata attached to certificates for any purpose.

type.description: Key-value pairs that can be used to group and search for certificates. Tags are metadata attached to certificates for any purpose.

properties.name: Usage
properties.description: Specifies the usage type for the certificate.

type.description: Specifies the usage type for the certificate.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

type.description: Specifies the unique Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the agreement.

properties.name: CertificateId
properties.description: A unique identifier for the certificate.

type.description: A unique identifier for the certificate.

properties.name: NotAfterDate
properties.description: Specifies the not after date for the certificate.

type.description: Specifies the not after date for the certificate.

properties.name: NotBeforeDate
properties.description: Specifies the not before date for the certificate.

type.description: Specifies the not before date for the certificate.

properties.name: Status
properties.description: A status description for the certificate.

type.description: A status description for the certificate.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: Describing the type of certificate. With or without a private key.

type.description: Describing the type of certificate. With or without a private key.
